cotton.network

Class NetworkPacket.NetworkPacketBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • cotton.network.NetworkPacket.NetworkPacketBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    NetworkPacket

    public static class NetworkPacket.NetworkPacketBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    An NetworkPacket builder to construct a NetworkPacket in separate steps.
